name: NPR
text:
A 37-year-old English translator is running against Belarusian President Alexander Lukashenko after her husband was denied registration as a candidate and jailed.

"I'm tired of being silent. I'm tired of being afraid," she said at a giant rally Thursday.

text:

text:
The Negro Leagues began 100 years ago to showcase Black baseball players when they were banned from the big leagues. About 100 players are still alive today.

Now, MLB is planning to honor them with a centennial celebration.

text:

text:
